txt.en: 'On the north side of Tol Fennas the Corsairs have set up a lumber camp, Makham Jurrar. The trees from the island are being brought there and felled. I believe they are using them to build a fleet of smaller vessels, just large enough to cross the channel and land in Belfalas. A fleet for a massive assault.\n\n'Head to the island. You can use a small boat in the harbour. Find this camp and defeat the Corsairs within.'
Glíreth is in Dol Amroth.\n\nGlíreth will be pleased to hear the workforce at Makham Jurrar has been noticeably reduced.
The Corsairs have set up Makham Jurrar, a lumber and shipyard camp on the north side of Tol Fennas.
'It is hard to build ships and fell lumber without men. Good work.'

Corsairs can be found at Makham Jurrar, the lumber and shipyard camp on the north side of Tol Fennas.\n\nGlíreth asked you to venture to Makham Jurrar and disrupt the lumber camp there. A boat in the harbour of Dol Amroth can take you to Tol Fennas.
